Articles.Content: A cool mission idea would be to get to the sun without infinite fuel on.

Hello there!

While this is a pretty good idea for a mission, I'd recommend checking out the submission guide to help set up some attractive-looking features for a challenge so people will attempt it. I'd certainly try!

Yes, I think checking the Submission Guide would do well for this challenge.

Maybe adding things like: How low can you go? or Smallest Craft gets more points.

Well, I'm guessing this is what you meant, so here you go:

Deathsat-1.
